name: Dicetopia
description:
This game is made for the GMTK 2022 Game jam.
Theme : Roll of the Dice.

Introduction
You are a magical girl who can use "Dice magic".

One day, one of your dice was lost and criminal left a note: "If you want get back your dice, please go to 74,14."

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Goal

you need find back your dice or you can't use the most of magic tricks.

And now, hit the road of adventure, beat the boss and get back your dice!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play

Energy bar control your dice, click space to stop the arrow, we'll see where the arrow stop and decide result.

Let's see your left area, there has 4 icons on the energy bar, if you roll the "Capricorn, Pisces, Sagittarius" that means you'll using different attack attributes to attack the boss, if you roll the "Boss" then boss will attack you.

And see your right area, there shows the rounds you can beat boss and how attack attributes restraint another attack attributes.
